試.definition: to test; to try; experiment; examination; test

試做.definition: to try doing (sth) to see how well it turns out; to experiment

試卷.definition: examination paper; test paper; CL:份[fen4],張|张[zhang1]

試問.definition: I would like to ask (usually used rhetorically); one might well ask

試婚.definition: trial marriage; to live together before deciding whether to marry

試客.definition: user of shareware or demo software

試射.definition: to test-fire; to conduct a missile test

試工.definition: to work for a trial period; worker on probation

試想.definition: to consider (a cogent point) (usu. used as an imperative – "Think about it: ...")

試手.definition: to work for a trial period; worker on probation

試手兒.definition: erhua variant of 試手|试手[shi4 shou3]

試探.definition: to sound out; to probe; to feel out; to try out

試杯.definition: Petri dish; test dish; trial slide

試水.definition: to run water through a system to test it (for leakages etc); (fig.) to test the waters; to do (sth) on a trial basis

試演.definition: audition; dress rehearsal; preview (of a theatrical performance); dummy run

試玩.definition: to try out (a game, toy etc)

試用.definition: to try sth out; to be on probation

試用本.definition: inspection copy (of a textbook etc); trial edition

試種.definition: test planting; crop grown on a trial basis

試穿.definition: to try wearing clothes; fitting trial

試管受孕.definition: in vitro fertilisation; test tube fertilisation

試聽.definition: audition; to give sb an audition; to check by listening

試航.definition: test flight (of aircraft); sea trial (of ship)

試藥族.definition: people who participate in clinical trials

試製.definition: to try out a new product (or manufacturing process); prototype; trial product

試讀.definition: to read a sample chapter of a book; to subscribe to a publication on a trial basis; to attend classes on a trial basis

試車.definition: to test drive; a trial run

試辦.definition: to try sth out; trial; pilot scheme

試金石.definition: touchstone; fig. test that sth is genuine

試錯.definition: trial and error (abbr. for 嘗試錯誤法|尝试错误法[chang2 shi4 cuo4 wu4 fa3]); to experiment (to see what works and what doesn't)

試鏡.definition: to take a screen test; to audition; screen test; audition; tryout

試驗.definition: experiment; test; CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]; to experiment; experimental

試點.definition: test point; to carry out trial; pilot scheme
